data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Name space is chosen based on Tim Bunce's suggestion for similar
    module:

    >> From: Tim Bunce (Tim.Bunce@pobox.com) >> Subject: Re: Module
    submission Net::Hylafax >> Newsgroups: perl.modules >> Date:
    2002-11-19 07:00:15 PST >> >> Just because a module uses a network
    protocol doesn't >> mean it should go into Net:: >> Seems much
    better to just use a Fax:: category: >> >> Fax::Hylafax >> >> or
    Fax::HylafaxFOO where FOO describes what this >> module offers in
    relation to Hylafax.
